title: The Bridge
overview: The Bridge sees in-depth discussions between three pairs from Activism, Comedy and Journalism: Model and activism icon, Munroe Bergdorf, chats to Black Lives Matter thought leader, Imarn Ayton; Legendary comedian Stephen K Amos is in conversation with recent TikTok superstar, Ehiz; Long-time journalist and presenter Sean Fletcher sits down with up and coming entertainment journalist, Will Njobvu.
